text: Hagi havige ava'nagna zama nege'za, havige kasanampa kema nehaza kasnampa vahera nazana erisga hu'na hara huzmantegahue. Ana hanuge'za Nagri vahe kevufina omanige, Israeli vahetmima zamagima krente'naza avontafepina zamagia kreontegahaze. Ana hanage'za Israeli mopafina vano osugahaze. E'ina hanuge'za Nagrikura Ra Anumza mani'ne hu'za ke'za antahi'za hugahaze.
